Turner and First Lady LaNett Turner (far left) lead the Entrance Processional to the ribbon cutting to begin the Entrance Service at Mount Vernon Baptist Church on Palm Sunday, March 29, 2015, in Atlanta. The church moved locations to make way for the Falcons new stadium. Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.com
